name: Q_P1D_Zero
description:
Q_P1D_Zero is a game made for the UE4s 2019 gamejam.

It's a first person shooter where you control a representation of Cupido, and shoot couples to form bonds of trust. These bonds will create weapons to fight a war against demons.

Game features 9 levels of increasing difficulty and was made over the course of 5 days.

Made by @wabbaboy wabbaboydev@gmail.com

Gamejam information can be found on a .txt inside the .7z file.
